title.rendered: Junji Ito Maniac: Japanese Tales of the Macabre

content.rendered:
Directed by Shinobu Tagashira.

Written by Junji Ito. Kaoru Sawada. Kaoru Sawada.

Cast Dorah Fine (Additional Voices). Mike McFarland (Additional Voices). Amber Lee Connors (Sayuri Tsujii). Stephen Fu (Additional Voices). Laura Megan Stahl (Additional Voices). John Eric Bentley (Additional Voices). Michelle Ruff (Additional Voices). Marin M. Miller (Additional Voices). Xanthe Huynh (Additional Voices). Landon McDonald (Additional Voices). Howard Wang (Additional Voices). Julie Ann Taylor (Additional Voices). Yong Yea (Additional Voices). Austin Lee Matthews (Additional Voices). Alan Lee (Additional Voices). Kaiji Tang (Additional Voices). Richard Epcar (Additional Voices). Ricco Fajardo (Additional Voices). Kirk Thornton (Additional Voices). Brianna Knickerbocker (Koko). Lizzie Freeman (Additional Voices). Kayli Mills (Masami).

Language Japanese.

Production Studio DEEN.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 12

Status OnGoing (2023–)
